name: SloWey
headerTaglineFour: based in Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam.

services.title: Software Development
services.description: I specialize in creating and developing innovative software solutions tailored to meet your specific business needs. By focusing on functionality and user experience, I ensure that your software is both efficient and user-friendly.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I design and develop robust websites that serve as the digital face of your business. From crafting unique brand elements like logos and color schemes to implementing advanced features, I make sure your website stands out and performs seamlessly.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: I enhance your online presence by designing intuitive and engaging user interfaces. By focusing on user experience, I ensure that your website or application is not only visually appealing but also easy to navigate, providing a seamless experience for your users.

services.title: Graphic Design
services.description: I combine creative design with technical expertise to create captivating visual content. Whether it's 3D visualizations, marketing materials, or brand assets, I bring your ideas to life with striking and impactful designs.

aboutpara: My name is Vinh Phuc, and I am a dedicated university student from Ho Chi Minh City. I am currently pursuing my degree in Software Engineering at the University of Information Technology. I am passionate about honing my skills in this field and am eager to contribute to the technological advancements of our society. I thrive in collaborative environments and am known for my ability to quickly grasp new concepts. Furthermore, I take great pride in my strong organizational skills which allow me to effectively manage my academic and extracurricular commitments.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, graphic designer.
resume.description: Software Engineer with 1 year experience in React Native and Java for Android. Skilled in crafting user-centric mobile experiences and leveraging cutting-edge technologies.

experiences.bullets: Designed and printed promotional materials for faculty initiatives and events resulting in increased event attendance and engagement.

experiences.position: Graphic Designer at The Big Nest F&B
experiences.bullets: Created a detailed style guide that standardized the design and branding of all company materials ensuring a consistent visual identity across all channels, Collaborated with the marketing team to understand requirements and deliver high-quality designs that aligned with the company's goals and target audience.

education.universityName: University of Information Technology - Vietnam National University Ho Chi Minh city
education.universityPara: Consistently achieved "Excellent" grades in both semesters of the 2022-2023 and 2023-2024 academic years, demonstrating a strong academic performance and commitment to excellence.
